vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the replacement of the playground at Garrett Park located at 1506 North Garrett Avenue with Kompan, Inc. through the Texas Association of School Boards cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $306,360.67 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($50,000.00), Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($121,954.30), and Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund ($134,406.37)
